entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:03 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:03 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 18.
